document_data.name: Senni Diggermattock
document_data.mainbody: '''Senni Diggermattock''' was, along with her husband [[Dorbo Diggermattock]], one of the informal rulers of the [[svirfneblin]] settlers in [[Blingdenstone]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Senni's main task was to find homes for all the new settlers. She also managed the commerce routes to [[Mithral Hall]], [[Gauntlgrym]], and [[Mantol-Derith]], and helped maintain the magical defenses of the city.
document_data.Personality: Senni valued and counted everything, to be sure that Dorbo had all he needed. She was devoted to the vision of a rebuilt Blingdenstone.
document_data.History:
Dorbo and Senni were capable miners, with Senni acting as administrator. With the money they gathered, Dorbo and Senni planned the reclamation of Blingdenstone. They pondered the reclamation mission for ten years, in order to consider all the dangers. Afterward, they led a contingent of settlers to Blingdenstone, slowly reclaiming parts of the city.

''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], Senni faced many threats.
